licensing: Do not copy proprietary text; author original summaries.
privacy: Do not include secrets or personal data in proxy audit reports.
safety: Do not overwrite existing proxy audit reports.
Reject context and session_id values containing path separators or dot-segments.

acceptance_criteria: Creates a proxy audit report under runtime/contexts/<context>/audits/proxy/.
Logs a U.Work record when telemetry/log-work is available.

input_fixture.recommendations: Run DoD verification; Capture missing artifacts

failure_modes: Invalid context or session_id value (not a safe path segment).
Failed to write the proxy audit report.

inputs.description: Bounded context name used to locate runtime/contexts/<context> (must be a safe path segment).
inputs.name: context

inputs.description: Session identifier to audit (safe path segment).
inputs.name: session_id

inputs.description: Optional semicolon-delimited list of related artifact paths.
inputs.name: artifacts

inputs.description: Optional path to a Definition of Done report.
inputs.name: dod_report

inputs.description: Optional agent type performing the audit.
inputs.name: agent_type

inputs.description: Optional RoleAssignment label used when logging U.Work (default: ProxyAuditor).
inputs.name: role_assignment

inputs.description: Optional semicolon-delimited list of related DRR ids or paths.
inputs.name: decisions

inputs.description: Optional ISO-8601 timestamp_start override (used for deterministic testing).
inputs.name: timestamp_start

intent.goal: Record a proxy audit verdict for a session with supporting notes and evidence links.
non_goals: Does not validate Definition of Done requirements.
Does not complete or modify the session record.

name: Proxy Audit Session

outputs.description: Path to the generated proxy audit report markdown file.
outputs.name: proxy_audit_report_path

procedure.instruction: Validate required inputs (context, session_id, verdict) and ensure safe path segments.
Resolve the proxy audit report path and ensure it does not already exist.
Write the proxy audit report with verdict, findings, and optional references.
If telemetry/log-work is available, log the proxy audit with agent metadata when provided.

summary: Issues a proxy audit verdict for a session.
